4312270.name: Mikseli: Genesis Demo
4312270.description:
Play the free demo of Mikseli: Genesis, a story-driven sci-fi action game about family, survival, and reunion.

Mission 1 — Family (TPS Fighter Combat):
Each Mikseli family member pilots their own fighter in a coordinated space assault. Take down enemy fighters, destroy the enemy colony ship, and eliminate the enemy base.

You continue as Arin in a grounded FPS mission on the Red Planet, fighting alone to survive. Your next objective leads toward the Green Planet, where Arin must push forward to save a captured family member.

This demo is built to show the core gameplay flow: cinematic story beats → high-intensity space combat → on-foot FPS progression.

Save System (Demo):

  • Auto-save / checkpoints enabled

  • Manual save & load supported

Wishlist the full game to follow development and upcoming content updates.

Key Features

  • Story-driven sci-fi action with cinematic moments

  • Family TPS fighter mission (each member has a ship)

  • Enemy fighters + colony ship + base destruction

  • Arin FPS mission

  • Autosave/checkpoints + manual save/load
4312270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
